venue.name: Tavern in the Square - Central Square

item.description:
Hello,

Let's get together and enjoy a few drinks (and possibly some food) cheering on our favorite countries. On Friday night there will be ice dancing, men and women's curling and women's skeleton (I don't know what that is-some type of skiing possibly??)

Here's a web site for the olympics: http://www.nbcolympic...

You can arrive late since we cannot make reservations for tables on Friday night. Hope to see you there.
Here is the Tavern in the Square website.

http://www.taverninth...

Parking in Central Square is easy. Also there is a T stop.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask at the Front for the Euro Meetup

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Olympics & Drinks
